title: Bioactivity and Chemical Profiling of the Sea-Ice Microalga
abstract: Antarctic algae have evolved in extreme environmental conditions, developing unique metabolic adaptations with significant biotechnological potential. In this study, we explored the bioactivity of the sea-ice microalga
clean_text: bioactivity and chemical profiling of the sea ice microalga antarctic algae have evolved in extreme environmental conditions developing unique metabolic adaptations with significant biotechnological potential in this study we explored the bioactivity of the sea ice microalga
